content.text: For recovery your login, folow the steps below;
Enter with valid e-mail and click in button "Send link for password redefinition"
Check the inbox of email informed.
Open the e-mail with "password redefinition" subject
Follow the password redefinition link for access the redefinition page.
After password redefinition, your will make login with your new password.
The redefinition password link will are valid only for 24 hours!
